statements: SELECT * FROM firmware_versions;
SELECT device_id, current_version FROM firmware_versions WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT current_version, new_version, release_date FROM firmware_versions WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM firmware_versions WHERE updated_at < NOW();
SELECT device_id, new_version FROM firmware_versions ORDER BY updated_at DESC;
SELECT current_version, new_version, release_date FROM firmware_versions WHERE device_id = '12345678-aaaa-bbbb-cccc-1234567890ab';
SELECT * FROM firmware_versions ORDER BY release_date DESC, updated_at ASC;
SELECT device_id, current_version FROM firmware_versions WHERE release_date >= '2021-01-01' AND release_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT device_id, new_version, updated_at FROM firmware_versions WHERE current_version <> new_version;
SELECT DISTINCT current_version FROM firmware_versions ORDER BY current_version ASC;
SELECT * FROM firmware_versions WHERE version_number='1.0';
SELECT device_id, version_number, release_date FROM firmware_versions ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT device_name FROM devices WHERE firmware_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT device_name, last_update FROM devices WHERE last_update BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT device_name, version_number, release_date FROM devices JOIN firmware_versions ON devices.firmware_id = firmware_versions.id;
SELECT * FROM firmware_versions WHERE version_number LIKE 'v%' ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM devices WHERE firmware_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY last_update ASC;
SELECT MAX(version_number) FROM firmware_versions;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) FROM devices GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT device_name, firmware_versions.version_number FROM devices JOIN firmware_versions ON devices.firmware_id = firmware_versions.id ORDER BY device_name ASC, firmware_versions.release_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM firmware_versions;
SELECT device_id, version_number, release_date FROM firmware_versions WHERE device_id = 123;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM updates WHERE update_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY update_date ASC;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(update_id) AS update_count FROM updates GROUP BY device_id HAVING update_count > 5;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Smartphone';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Laptop' ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_id, version_number, release_date FROM firmware_versions WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY release_date ASC;
SELECT devices.device_name, updates.version_number FROM devices JOIN updates ON devices.device_id = updates.device_id;
SELECT * FROM devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices WHERE location = 'USA';
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices WHERE device_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM firmware_versions WHERE version_number LIKE 'v1.%';
SELECT device_name, COUNT(*) FROM devices GROUP BY device_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM firmware_versions ORDER BY release_date DESC, version_number;
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices WHERE device_id = 3;
SELECT u.update_id, u.update_date, l.log_message FROM updates u JOIN update_logs l ON u.update_id = l.update_id WHERE u.device_id = 5;
SELECT device_name, COUNT(u.update_id) AS total_updates FROM devices d LEFT JOIN updates u ON d.device_id = u.device_id GROUP BY device_name;
SELECT d.device_id, d.device_name, COUNT(u.update_id) AS total_updates FROM devices d LEFT JOIN updates u ON d.device_id = u.device_id GROUP BY d.device_id, d.device_name HAVING total_updates >= 3;
SELECT * FROM firmware_versions;
SELECT version_number, release_date FROM firmware_versions WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer_name FROM devices JOIN manufacturers ON devices.device_id = manufacturers.manufacturer_id;
SELECT firmware_id, version_number, release_date FROM firmware ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS firmware_count FROM device_firmware GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT device_name, firmware_versions.version_number, release_date FROM devices JOIN firmware_versions ON devices.device_id = firmware_versions.device_id

SELECT firmware_versions.version_number, devices.device_name, manufacturer_name FROM firmware_versions JOIN devices ON firmware_versions.device_id = devices.device_id JOIN manufacturers ON firmware.manufacturer_id = manufacturers.manufacturer_id

SELECT firmware_versions.version_number, devices.device_name, firmware.release_date, manufacturers.manufacturer_name FROM firmware_versions JOIN devices ON firmware_versions.device_id = devices.device_id JOIN firmware ON firmware_versions.version_number = firmware.version_number JOIN manufacturers ON firmware.manufacturer_id = manufacturers.manufacturer_id

SELECT firmware_versions.version_number, devices.device_name, firmware.release_date, manufacturers.manufacturer_name FROM firmware_versions JOIN devices ON firmware_versions.device_id = devices.device_id JOIN firmware ON firmware_versions.version_number = firmware.version_number JOIN manufacturers ON firmware.manufacturer_id = manufacturers.manufacturer_id WHERE firmware_versions.release_date > '2022-01-01'

SELECT firmware.release_date, manufacturer_name, version_number FROM firmware JOIN manufacturers ON firmware.manufacturer_id = manufacturers.manufacturer_id JOIN firmware_versions ON firmware.version_number = firmware_versions.version_number WHERE firmware_versions.release_date < '2023-01-01'
